sprays.name: Bicycle Kick
sprays.description: Score a goal in Lúcioball with a shot taken from at least 4 meters in the air.

sprays.name: Goal Blossom
sprays.description: Score a goal, a save, and an assist in a game of Lúcioball.

sprays.name: Safe Hands
sprays.description: Score 3 saves in a row in Lúcioball.

voicelines.name: Keep your eye on the ball

skins.name: Taegeukgi
skins.description: During her time as a professional gamer, D.Va proudly represented her country in tournaments around the world.

skins.name: Eidgenossin
skins.description: After finishing her education, including her MD and PhD in Switzerland, Angela Ziegler continued her research and served as head of surgery in a prominent hospital in her home country.

skins.name: Cricket
skins.description: Junkrat gives new meaning to "the Ashes."

skins.name: Seleção
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

skins.name: Striker
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

skins.name: Champion
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

skins.name: Weightlifter
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

skins.name: Dr. Junkenstein
skins.description: As the tale goes, Dr. Junkenstein made a deal with the Witch of the Wilds in exchange for the secret to creating life. But his triumph was short lived as he was slain by four wanderers in Adlersbrunn.

skins.name: Witch
skins.description: The Witch of the Wilds is a mysterious figure who appears in the tale of Dr. Junkenstein and others, offering people the object of their desire, for a price.

skins.name: Pumpkin
skins.description: In the tale of Dr. Junkenstein, the Reaper was a servant to the Witch of the Wilds, bound to serve her for some unknown reason.

skins.name: Junkenstein's Monster
skins.description: Armed with the secret of creating artificial life, Dr. Jamison Junkenstein birthed a monster.

skins.name: Dragon
skins.description: As the tales tell, the Witch of the Wilds had many powerful allies, including the draconic summoner.

skins.name: Viking
skins.description: After his village was burned by a dragon's fire, the viking now travels the world, hunting them.

sprays.name: Flaming Pumpkin
sprays.description: Survive 12 bonus waves in Junkenstein Endless.

sprays.name: Halloween Special
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Legendary difficulty.

sprays.name: Junkenstein's Revenge
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: My Creations
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein Endless with 6 different heroes.

sprays.name: Rise of the Zomnics
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge using each of the 4 heroes.

sprays.name: The Monster
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein Endless on Hard difficulty with no damage to the door.

sprays.name: The Reapening
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Hard difficulty with no damage to the door.

sprays.name: The Reaper
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Expert difficulty.

sprays.name: The Witch
sprays.description: Survive 4 bonus waves in Junkenstein Endless on Expert difficulty.

sprays.name: Zombardier
sprays.description: Survive 4 bonus waves in Junkenstein Endless on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: Zomnic
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge with 6 different heroes.

poses.name: R.I.P.
poses.description: Responsible for so many deaths during the Omnic Crisis, even today Bastion units are a symbol of fear.

skins.name: Andes
skins.description: When the weather gets cold, Lúcio heads to the Andes to hit the slopes.

skins.name: Santaclad
skins.description: At the gentle urging of his wife, Ingrid, Torbjörn dresses up as Santa for the Lindholm holiday celebrations.

sprays.name: Bonk
sprays.description: Kill 2 enemies with a single use of Mei's Flurry in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Frozen Throne
sprays.description: Win a round as the sole survivor in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Snowcree
sprays.description: Kill an enemy with a snowball from 25 meters away in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Snowhog
sprays.description: Kill 3 enemies while they are picking up snow in a game of Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Snowmei
sprays.description: Win Mei's Snowball Offensive without losing a round.

sprays.name: Snowreaper
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies without missing in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Yeti
sprays.description: Eat 4 meat as the Yeti in Yeti Hunter.

sprays.name: Yeti Hunter
sprays.description: Trap the Yeti as a Hunter in Yeti Hunter.

sprays.name: Yeti Rage
sprays.description: Kill 3 enemies as the Yeti in Yeti Hunt.

voicelines.name: It's a giving time of year
I Made That Just for You
Did you bring me a present?
Go on... give it a shake!
I could use the time off
Can't I guide your way tonight
I have your present right here

sprays.name: Auspicious Lion
sprays.description: Recover a flag in a game of Capture the Flag.

sprays.name: Awakened Lion
sprays.description: Win Capture the Flag with a score of 3 to 0.

voicelines.name: I have the devil's own luck
It's all gone to the dogs

sprays.name: B73-NS
sprays.description: Complete Uprising on Expert difficulty.

sprays.name: Droppachi
sprays.description: Complete Retribution on Expert difficulty.

sprays.name: Eradicator
sprays.description: Complete Uprising on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: Nullmari
sprays.description: Complete Uprising (All Heroes) with 8 different heroes.

sprays.name: Nulltrooper
sprays.description: Complete Uprising with each of the 4 heroes.

sprays.name: OR14-NS
sprays.description: Complete Uprising on Legendary difficulty.

sprays.name: Slicer
sprays.description: Deliver the payload with over 80% health in Uprising on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: Talon Assassin
sprays.description: Complete Retribution on Expert difficulty with no incapacitations.

sprays.name: Talon Enforcer
sprays.description: Complete Retribution (All Heroes) with 8 different heroes.

sprays.name: Talon Heavy Assault
sprays.description: Complete Retribution on Legendary difficulty.

sprays.name: Talon Sniper
sprays.description: Complete Retribution on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: Talon Trooper
sprays.description: Complete Retribution with each of the 4 heroes.

voicelines.name: A chicken out of a feather
Time to roll up my sleeves
I didn't ask for your opinion
I know you can do better
My fate is written in blood
Turn it up in my headphones
I was only trying to help
I live for a good fight
I'd love to stay and chat

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: Bastion units were reengineered and upgraded by Null Sector and deployed during the King's Row Uprising.

skins.name: Lieutenant Wilhelm
skins.description: Lieutenant Reinhardt Wilhelm served with distinction in his time during Overwatch, notably leading the strike team that ended the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: After agreeing to aid the organization, Genji was upgraded extensively by Overwatch's cyberneticists.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: A young Jesse McCree was recruited into Blackwatch after Gabriel Reyes saw his potential and gave him a choice: join Blackwatch, or rot in prison.

skins.name: Combat Medic Ziegler
skins.description: When called upon, Mercy would don her Valkyrie swift-response suit to participate in Overwatch missions.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: During the King's Row Uprising, Null Sector employed redesigned and upgraded OR14 Idina bots to secure the power station.

skins.name: Chief Engineer Lindholm
skins.description: For many years, Torbjörn Lindholm served as Overwatch's chief engineer, designing many of the organization's iconic weapons and technologies.

skins.name: Cadet Oxton
skins.description: Tracer was put into active duty as an Overwatch agent for the first time during the King's Row uprising.

skinsLegendary.name: Talon
skinsLegendary.description: Doomfist rose in power in Talon after killing his mentor, Akinjide Adeyemi, the Scourge of Numbani.

skinsLegendary.name: Scion
skinsLegendary.description: Over the centuries, the Shimada clan grew to profit from a lucrative trade in arms and other illegal substances.

skinsLegendary.name: Pajamei
skinsLegendary.description: Due to a malfunction of Ecopoint: Antarctica's cryogenics facility, Mei was kept in hibernation for almost a decade and woke up to find a new, unfamiliar world.

skinsLegendary.name: Blackwatch
skinsLegendary.description: In addition to her research as a part of Blackwatch, Moira occasionally participated in clandestine operations, including the Venice Incident.

skinsLegendary.name: Soldier: 24
skinsLegendary.description: Before serving on the original Overwatch strike team, Gabriel Reyes was selected to be a member of the government's classified soldier enhancement program.

skinsLegendary.name: Talon
skinsLegendary.description: Sombra is only too happy to utilize the power and reach of Talon while pursuing her own goals.

skinsLegendary.name: Specimen 28
skinsLegendary.description: The gorilla known as Specimen 28 showed rapid brain development from genetic therapy, surpassing that of the other subjects.

voicelines.name: You need to learn to relax
How do you like me now?
I was only trying to help
Have a bad feeling about this
Why didn't I think of that?
Can't keep a good ape down

skinsLegendary.name: Sherlock
skinsLegendary.description: "My mind," he said, "rebels at stagnation. Give me problems, give me work, give me the most abstruse cryptogram or the most intricate analysis, and I am in my proper atmosphere."

ana.name: Ana
ana.description: Former second in command of Overwatch, Ana Amari uses her skills and expertise to defend her home and the people she cares for.

skins.name: Merciful
skins.description: Ana's biotic rifle uses a modified version of Mercy's healing technology, though the weapon was created against the doctor's wishes.

skins.name: Shrike
skins.description: Recently, Ana has operated under the alias of "Shrike" and is wanted for espionage, assault, and theft in Egypt.

skins.name: Captain Amari
skins.description: Captain Ana Amari was Strike Commander Morrison's second in command of Overwatch.

skins.name: Horus
skins.description: Ana's call sign was "Horus" when she served in the Egyptian military during the Omnic Crisis.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Get 4 kills or assists with a single use of Ana's Nano Boost in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Ana's Sleep Dart in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: It takes a woman to know
You need to learn to relax

ashe.name: Ashe
ashe.description: Ashe is the leader of the Deadlock Gang, a group of bandits and criminals who menace the American Southwest.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Get a killing blow as Ashe on an enemy knocked into the air by B.O.B. in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Kill an enemy by shooting Ashe’s Dynamite from at least 30 meters away in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Loot
sprays.description: Unlocked by watching participating streams during the November 2018 Free Trial

sprays.description: Unlocked by watching participating streams during the November 2018 Free Trial

sprays.name: Triplets
sprays.description: Unlocked by watching participating streams during the November 2018 Free Trial

voicelines.name: It's a giving time of year

bastion.name: Bastion
bastion.description: Once a frontline combatant in the Omnic Crisis, this curious Bastion unit now explores the world, fascinated by nature but wary of a fearful humanity.

skins.name: Omnic Crisis
skins.description: During the Omnic Crisis, Bastion units fought against humans in battles around the world.

skins.name: BlizzCon 2016
skins.description: Unlocked as part of the BlizzCon 2016 Goody Bag

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: Bastion units were reengineered and upgraded by Null Sector and deployed during the King's Row Uprising.

skins.name: Overgrown
skins.description: Damaged in one of the battles of the Omnic Crisis, this lone Bastion unit was reactivated in the Black Forest near Eichenwalde years later.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Bastion's Configuration: Tank in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Kill 2 enemies in each of Bastion's configurations without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

poses.name: R.I.P.
poses.description: Responsible for so many deaths during the Omnic Crisis, even today Bastion units are a symbol of fear.

brigitte.name: Brigitte
brigitte.description: Brigitte Lindholm, squire to Reinhardt Wilhelm, is a former mechanical engineer who has decided to take up arms and fight on the front lines to protect those in need.

skins.name: Engineer
skins.description: Before taking up arms, Brigitte planned to pursue a career as an engineer who specialized  in the creation of armor and other defensive systems.

skins.name: Mechanic
skins.description: Before taking up arms, Brigitte planned to pursue a career as an engineer who specialized  in the creation of armor and other defensive systems.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill an airborne enemy with Brigitte's Whip Shot in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Brigitte's Shield Bash in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: I Made That Just for You
A chicken out of a feather
Time to roll up my sleeves

dva.name: D.Va
dva.description: D.Va is a former professional gamer who now uses her skills to pilot a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her country.

skins.name: Nano
skins.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

skins.name: Taegeukgi
skins.description: During her time as a professional gamer, D.Va proudly represented her country in tournaments around the world.

skins.name: Junker
skins.description: Mech battles are one of the most popular forms of entertainment in Junkertown.

skins.name: Scavenger
skins.description: Mech battles are one of the most popular forms of entertainment in Junkertown.

icons.name: Nano Cola
icons.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of D.va's Self Destruct in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Prevent 1500 damage with a single use of D.va's Defense Matrix in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Angry
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Astonished
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Enjoy!
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Grabs a Popcorn
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Hi
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Pat Pat
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Refreshment
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Sleepy
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Twinkle
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

sprays.name: Victory
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in D.Va's Nano Cola Challenge

doomfist.name: Doomfist
doomfist.description: One of the leaders of Talon, Doomfist is determined to plunge the world into a new conflict that he believes will make humanity stronger.

skins.name: Caution
skins.description: After losing his arm in the aftermath of the Omnic Crisis, Doomfist turned to cybernetics to recover and become even stronger than before.

skins.name: Irin
skins.description: After losing his arm in the aftermath of the Omnic Crisis, Doomfist turned to cybernetics to recover and become even stronger than before.

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: Doomfist rose in power in Talon after killing his mentor, Akinjide Adeyemi, the Scourge of Numbani.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Hit 6 enemies with a single use of Doomfist's Meteor Strike in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Get a killing blow with Doomfist's full-power Seismic Slam in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: One punch is all I need
Did you bring me a present?
I didn't ask for your opinion
I know you can do better

genji.name: Genji
genji.description: Genji Shimada has made peace with the cyborg body he once rejected, and in doing so, he has discovered a higher humanity.

skins.name: Bedouin
skins.description: After leaving Overwatch, Genji wandered the world, trying to come to peace with his cyborg body.

skins.name: Nomad
skins.description: After leaving Overwatch, Genji wandered the world, trying to come to peace with his cyborg body.

skins.name: Sparrow
skins.description: In his youth, Genji's father, Sojiro, gave him the diminutive nickname, "Sparrow."

skins.name: Young Genji
skins.description: The younger scion of the Shimada clan, Genji had little interest in carrying on the family's business, and spent his days on frivolous pursuits.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: After agreeing to aid the organization, Genji was upgraded extensively by Overwatch's cyberneticists.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Genji's Dragonblade in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Kill 2 enemies with a single use of Genji's Deflection in Quick or Competitive Play.

hanzo.name: Hanzo
hanzo.description: Mastering his skills as a bowman and an assassin, Hanzo Shimada strives to prove himself as a warrior without peer.

skins.name: Young Hanzo
skins.description: Hanzo was the son of the former master of the Shimada clan. He had been groomed to take over leadership of the family as his father's successor.

skins.name: Young Master
skins.description: Hanzo was the son of the former master of the Shimada clan. He had been groomed to take over leadership of the family as his father's successor.

skins.name: Scion
skins.description: Over the centuries, the Shimada clan grew to profit from a lucrative trade in arms and other illegal substances.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with one of Hanzo's Spirit Dragons in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Get 3 killing blows with a single use of Hanzo's Storm Arrows in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: My fate is written in blood

junkrat.name: Junkrat
junkrat.description: Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed freak who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

skins.name: Bleached
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Drowned
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Irradiated
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Rusted
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Cricket
skins.description: Junkrat gives new meaning to "the Ashes."

skins.name: Dr. Junkenstein
skins.description: As the tale goes, Dr. Junkenstein made a deal with the Witch of the Wilds in exchange for the secret to creating life. But his triumph was short lived as he was slain by four wanderers in Adlersbrunn.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Junkrat's RIP-Tire in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Knock an enemy into your Steel Trap using Junkrat's Concussion Mine in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Go on... give it a shake!

lucio.name: Lúcio
lucio.description: Lúcio is an international celebrity and musician who inspires social change through his music and actions.

skins.name: Auditiva
skins.description: Lúcio's latest album, Synaesthesia Auditiva, was a global hit.

skins.name: Synaesthesia
skins.description: Lúcio's latest album, Synaesthesia Auditiva, was a global hit.

skins.name: Andes
skins.description: When the weather gets cold, Lúcio heads to the Andes to hit the slopes.

skins.name: Seleção
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

skins.name: Striker
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Block 1000 damage with a single use of Lúcio's Sound Barrier in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Get 3 killing blows while wall riding as Lúcio without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: I could do this all day
I'm on top of the world
Turn it up in my headphones

mccree.name: McCree
mccree.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, the outlaw Jesse McCree doles out justice on his own terms.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: A young Jesse McCree was recruited into Blackwatch after Gabriel Reyes saw his potential and gave him a choice: join Blackwatch, or rot in prison.

skins.name: Sherlock
skins.description: "My mind," he said, "rebels at stagnation. Give me problems, give me work, give me the most abstruse cryptogram or the most intricate analysis, and I am in my proper atmosphere."

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Get 4 killing blows with a single use of McCree's Deadeye in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with McCree's Flashbang in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Happens to the best of us
How do you like me now?

mei.name: Mei
mei.description: Mei is a climatologist who has taken the fight to preserve the environment and protect the world into her own hands.

skins.name: Abominable
skins.description: Mei travels to remote regions around the world, investigating ecopoints abandoned since Overwatch was shut down.

skins.name: Ecopoint: Antarctica
skins.description: While she was stationed at Ecopoint: Antarctica, Mei performed research on climate anomalies in the region.

skins.name: Yeti Hunter
skins.description: Mei travels to remote regions around the world, investigating ecopoints abandoned since Overwatch was shut down.

skins.name: Pajamei
skins.description: Due to a malfunction of Ecopoint: Antarctica's cryogenics facility, Mei was kept in hibernation for almost a decade and woke up to find a new, unfamiliar world.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Freeze 4 enemies at once with Mei in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Block 1200 damage with a single use of Mei's Ice Wall in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: You have to let it go
I was only trying to help

mercy.name: Mercy
mercy.description: A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Mercy is a peerless healer, a brilliant scientist, and a staunch advocate for peace.

skins.name: Eidgenossin
skins.description: After finishing her education, including her MD and PhD in Switzerland, Angela Ziegler continued her research and served as head of surgery in a prominent hospital in her home country.

skins.name: Pink
skins.description: Unlocked with purchase of Pink charity skin

skins.name: Witch
skins.description: The Witch of the Wilds is a mysterious figure who appears in the tale of Dr. Junkenstein and others, offering people the object of their desire, for a price.

skins.name: Combat Medic Ziegler
skins.description: When called upon, Mercy would don her Valkyrie swift-response suit to participate in Overwatch missions.

icons.name: Pink
icons.description: Unlocked by participating in the 2018 BCRF charity event

icons.name: Ribbon
icons.description: Unlocked by participating in the 2018 BCRF charity event

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Resurrect 6 allies without dying as Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Restore 200 health for 5 allies without dying as Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Cure
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in the 2018 BCRF charity event

sprays.name: Pink
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in the 2018 BCRF charity event

sprays.name: Ribbon
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in the 2018 BCRF charity event

sprays.name: Together
sprays.description: Unlocked by participating in the 2018 BCRF charity event

voicelines.name: I have my eye on you
I could use the time off

moira.name: Moira
moira.description: Equal parts brilliant and controversial, Talon scientist Moira O'Deorain is on the cutting edge of genetic engineering, searching for a way to rewrite the fundamental building blocks of life.

skins.name: Minister
skins.description: Thanks to her brilliance and their shared desire to achieve scientific advancement at any cost, the founders of Oasis invited her to join them as their Minister of Genetics.

skins.name: Oasis
skins.description: Thanks to her brilliance and their shared desire to achieve scientific advancement at any cost, the founders of Oasis invited her to join them as their Minister of Genetics.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: In addition to her research as a part of Blackwatch, Moira occasionally participated in clandestine operations, including the Venice Incident.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Hit 7 targets simultaneously with Moira's Coalescence in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Fully deplete both types of Moira's Biotic Orb without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

orisa.name: Orisa
orisa.description: Built from parts of one of Numbani's short-lived OR15 defense robots, Orisa is the city's newest protector, though she still has much to learn.

skins.name: OR15
skins.description: Originally built to protect Numbani, the OR15 defense bots were destroyed and decommissioned after a battle with Doomfist. A young Efi Oladele would purchase the parts of the bots to build Orisa.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: During the King's Row Uprising, Null Sector employed redesigned and upgraded OR14 Idina bots to secure the power station.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Amplify 900 damage with a single use of Orisa's Supercharger in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Pull enemies into 1000 damage with a single use of Orisa's Halt! in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Can't I guide your way tonight
I was only trying to help
Have a bad feeling about this

pharah.name: Pharah
pharah.description: Pharah's commitment to duty runs in her blood. She comes from a long line of highly decorated soldiers and burns with the desire to serve with honor.

skins.name: Anubis
skins.description: Pharah was assigned to protect a secure Helix AI installation in Egypt at the Temple of Anubis. While the AI was briefly able to break containment, Pharah and her team were able to subdue it.

skins.name: Security Chief
skins.description: Following a sterling career in the Egyptian armed forces, Pharah joined Helix Security International as one of their chief officers.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies in a row without touching the ground as Pharah in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Knock an enemy to their death using Pharah's Concussive Blast in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Sorry, but I need to jet
I live for a good fight

reaper.name: Reaper
reaper.description: Some speak of a black-robed terrorist known only as the Reaper. His identity and motives are a mystery. What is known is that where he appears, death follows.

skins.name: Nevermore
skins.description: Quoth the raven, "Nevermore."

skins.name: Blackwatch Reyes
skins.description: Gabriel Reyes was the leader of the original Overwatch strike team during the Omnic Crisis, and later commanded Blackwatch, the organization's covert ops division.

skins.name: Pumpkin
skins.description: In the tale of Dr. Junkenstein, the Reaper was a servant to the Witch of the Wilds, bound to serve her for some unknown reason.

skins.name: Soldier: 24
skins.description: Before serving on the original Overwatch strike team, Gabriel Reyes was selected to be a member of the government's classified soldier enhancement program.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Reaper's Death Blossom in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Get 3 solo kills with a single clip of Reaper's shotguns in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: If it lives, I can kill it
I have the devil's own luck

reinhardt.name: Reinhardt
reinhardt.description: Reinhardt Wilhelm styles himself as a champion of a bygone age, who lives by the knightly codes of valor, justice, and courage.

skins.name: Bundeswehr
skins.description: At a young age, Reinhardt Wilhelm enlisted in the German armed forces, seeking glory.

skins.name: Lieutenant Wilhelm
skins.description: Lieutenant Reinhardt Wilhelm served with distinction in his time during Overwatch, notably leading the strike team that ended the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Balderich
skins.description: During the Omnic Crisis, Balderich von Adler commanded the German Crusader unit until he was killed at the battle of Eichenwalde.

skins.name: Crusader
skins.description: "The Hero of Eichenwalde," Reinhardt joined the original Overwatch team in the place of his fallen commander, Balderich.

skins.name: Greifhardt
skins.description: After the Battle of Eichenwalde, Balderich von Adler's armor remained undisturbed for many years.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Land Reinhardt's Fire Strike and Charge after an Earthshatter stun in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Block 8000 damage with Reinhardt's Barrier Field without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

roadhog.name: Roadhog
roadhog.description: Roadhog is a ruthless killer with a well-earned reputation for cruelty and wanton destruction.

skins.name: Junkenstein's Monster
skins.description: Armed with the secret of creating artificial life, Dr. Jamison Junkenstein birthed a monster.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Knock 2 enemies to their deaths with one use of Roadhog's Whole Hog in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Roadhog's Hook in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Life is pain, so is death
I have your present right here
It's all gone to the dogs

soldier-76.name: Soldier: 76
soldier-76.description: Currently the target of an international manhunt, the vigilante known as Soldier: 76 wages a personal war to expose the truth behind Overwatch's collapse.

skins.name: Commando: 76
skins.description: At his first opportunity, a young Jack Morrison enlisted in the American armed forces to defend his country, serving with distinction during the Omnic Crisis.

skins.name: Night Ops: 76
skins.description: At his first opportunity, a young Jack Morrison enlisted in the American armed forces to defend his country, serving with distinction during the Omnic Crisis.

skins.name: Strike Commander Morrison
skins.description: After the Omnic Crisis, Jack Morrison was promoted to Strike Commander of Overwatch, leading the organization for decades until it was disbanded.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Soldier: 76's Tactical Visor in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Soldier: 76's Helix Rockets in Quick or Competitive Play.

sombra.name: Sombra
sombra.description: One of the world's most notorious hackers, Sombra uses information to manipulate those in power.

skins.name: Azúcar
skins.description: Orphaned after the Omnic Crisis, a young Sombra found a willing buyer for her hacking ability in Los Muertos.

skins.name: Los Muertos
skins.description: Orphaned after the Omnic Crisis, a young Sombra found a willing buyer for her hacking ability in Los Muertos.

skins.name: Demon Hunter
skins.description: Unlocked as part of the BlizzCon 2018 In-Game Goodies

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: Sombra is only too happy to utilize the power and reach of Talon while pursuing her own goals.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Hack 6 enemies at once as Sombra in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Hack 15 enemies without dying as Sombra in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Did you mean to do that?
I'd love to stay and chat

symmetra.name: Symmetra
symmetra.description: Symmetra literally bends reality. By manipulating hard-light constructs, she crafts the world as she wishes it to be, in hopes of engineering a perfect society.

skins.name: Utopaea
skins.description: Designed by its most talented Architechs, Utopaea is the jewel of the Vishkar Corporation's developments around the world.

skins.name: Architech
skins.description: Noticed at a young age for her potential in the area of hard-light engineering, Satya Vaswani was placed in the Vishkar Corporation's academy to become a future architech.

skins.name: Vishkar
skins.description: As one of the Vishkar Corporation's most talented architechs, Symmetra was dispatched to Rio de Janeiro to oversee their new development efforts.

skins.name: Dragon
skins.description: As the tales tell, the Witch of the Wilds had many powerful allies, including the draconic summoner.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Teleport 20 allies in a single Quick or Competitive Play game as Symmetra.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Hit an enemy with 3 beams simultaneously as Symmetra in Quick or Competitive Play.

torbjorn.name: Torbjörn
torbjorn.description: At its height, Overwatch possessed one of the most advanced armaments on the planet, which could be traced to the workshop of an ingenious engineer named Torbjörn Lindholm.

skins.name: Viking
skins.description: After his village was burned by a dragon's fire, the viking now travels the world, hunting them.

skins.name: Santaclad
skins.description: At the gentle urging of his wife, Ingrid, Torbjörn dresses up as Santa for the Lindholm holiday celebrations.

skins.name: Chief Engineer Lindholm
skins.description: For many years, Torbjörn Lindholm served as Overwatch's chief engineer, designing many of the organization's iconic weapons and technologies.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies during a single use of Torbjörn's Molten Core in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Absorb 500 armor damage with Torbjörn's Overload without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: A chicken out of a feather
I'm giving it all I've got!
For the Alliance
voicelines.description: Unlocked with purchase of World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition

voicelines.name: For the Horde
voicelines.description: Unlocked with purchase of World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition

voicelines.name: Why didn't I think of that?

tracer.name: Tracer
tracer.description: The former Overwatch agent known as Tracer is a time-jumping adventurer and an irrepressible force for good.

skins.name: Slipstream
skins.description: Before becoming an active agent of Overwatch, Tracer was a test pilot, until a mishap with the prototype Slipstream teleporting fighter.

skins.name: Cadet Oxton
skins.description: Tracer was put into active duty as an Overwatch agent for the first time during the King's Row uprising.

emotes.name: Alliance Banner
emotes.description: Unlocked with purchase of World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition

emotes.name: Horde Banner
emotes.description: Unlocked with purchase of World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Stick 4 of Tracer's Pulse Bombs onto enemies in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Recover 400 health using Tracer's Recall without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

widowmaker.name: Widowmaker
widowmaker.description: Widowmaker is the perfect assassin: a patient, ruthlessly efficient killer who shows neither emotion nor remorse.

skins.name: Comtesse
skins.description: The historical motto of the Guillard family was, "Chasseurs toujours."

skins.name: Odette
skins.description: For much of her life, Amélie Lacroix was better known as an accomplished ballet dancer in Paris.

skins.name: Odile
skins.description: For much of her life, Amélie Lacroix was better known as an accomplished ballet dancer in Paris.

skins.name: Kerrigan
skins.description: Unlocked as part of the StarCraft 20th Anniversary Celebration

skins.name: Noire
skins.description: Unlocked by pre-purchasing Overwatch

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Kill an enemy with a scoped headshot while airborne as Widowmaker in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies using Widowmaker's Venom Mine during a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

winston.name: Winston
winston.description: A super-intelligent, genetically engineered gorilla, Winston is a brilliant scientist and a champion for humanity's potential.

skins.name: Horizon
skins.description: Most of Winston's formative years were spent as a test subject in the Horizon Lunar Colony.

skins.name: BlizzCon 2017
skins.description: Unlocked as part of the BlizzCon 2017 In-Game Goodies

skins.name: Specimen 28
skins.description: The gorilla known as Specimen 28 showed rapid brain development from genetic therapy, surpassing that of the other subjects.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Damage 6 enemies during a single use of Winston's Primal Rage in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Destroy 10 turrets or traps using Winston's Tesla Cannon without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: I do not want a banana
Can't keep a good ape down

wrecking-ball.name: Hammond
wrecking-ball.description: Wrecking Ball is piloted by an intelligent, genetically engineered hamster named Hammond, who explores the world, searching for adventure.

skins.name: Horizon
skins.description: Hammond fled the Horizon Lunar Colony by constructing a makeshift escape pod and secretly anchoring it to Winston's craft.

skins.name: Junker
skins.description: Wrecking Ball climbed the ranks to become the champion of the Scrapyard, Junkertown's mech combat arena.

skins.name: Lunar
skins.description: Hammond fled the Horizon Lunar Colony by constructing a makeshift escape pod and secretly anchoring it to Winston's craft.

skins.name: Mayham
skins.description: Wrecking Ball climbed the ranks to become the champion of the Scrapyard, Junkertown's mech combat arena.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Roll through 4 enemies within 2 seconds as Wrecking Ball in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Absorb 1500 damage with Wrecking Ball's Adaptive Shield without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: Keep your eye on the ball

zarya.name: Zarya
zarya.description: Zarya is one of the world's strongest women, a celebrated athlete who sacrificed personal glory to protect her family, friends, and country in a time of war.

skins.name: Arctic
skins.description: After her retirement from competition, Zarya enlisted in the Russian defense forces and was deployed to the Krasnoyarsk front in Siberia.

skins.name: Siberian Front
skins.description: After her retirement from competition, Zarya enlisted in the Russian defense forces and was deployed to the Krasnoyarsk front in Siberia.

skins.name: Champion
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

skins.name: Weightlifter
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Capture 5 enemies in a single use of Zarya's Graviton Surge in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Keep Zarya's particle cannon above 70 power for 60 seconds in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: I can bench more than you

zenyatta.name: Zenyatta
zenyatta.description: Zenyatta is an omnic monk who wanders the world in search of spiritual enlightenment. It is said that those who cross his path are never the same again.

sprays.name: Cute
sprays.description: Restore 1500 health with a single use of Zenyatta's Transcendence in Quick or Competitive Play.

sprays.name: Pixel
sprays.description: Get 4 kills or assists with Zenyatta's Orb of Discord within 6 seconds in Quick or Competitive Play.

voicelines.name: I dreamt I was a butterfly
